derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from modern Latin modularis, from Latin modulus (see modulus)

entry.tran: (建筑中)组合的，组件的，模件的
entry.def: In building, modular means relating to the construction of buildings in parts called modules.

example.ex: They ended up buying a prebuilt modular home on a two-acre lot.
example.tran: 最后他们购买了一幢建在两英亩土地上的预制组合式房屋。

entry.tran: (大学课程教学)单元的，分单元的
entry.def: Modular means relating to the teaching of courses at college or university in units called modules.

example.ex: The course is modular in structure.
example.tran: 该课程在结构上以单元划分。

means.word_mean: 1. constructed with standardized units or dimensions allowing flexibility and variety in use;
